Bloc Party frontman Kele Okereke has revealed the video for new solo single 'Doubt'.

The 'Doubt' video was animated by David Altweger and directed by Nova Dando, who has previously directed videos for Kele in both his solo and Bloc Party guises.

'Doubt' features on Okereke's forthcoming second solo album 'Trick'. The album follows the 2010 release of 'The Boxer' and sees the singer return to dance music after reuniting Bloc Party and releasing 'Four' with the band in 2012.
